description: Try our easy to follow Fish Parcels with Dill & Lemon recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Fish Parcels with Dill & Lemon Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200Â°C. Cut 4 pieces of baking paper large enough to wrap fish.

Place a piece of fish onto each piece of baking paper. Season with salt and freshly ground black pepper and top with some sprigs of dill. Place 2 slices of lemon and a few spears of asparagus on each. Dot with butter.
Bring sides of the paper up and fold over a few times to seal. Fold in ends and tuck under parcel. Place onto a baking tray. Bake for 15 minutes or until fish is cooked.
Serve parcels with steamed potatoes and extra vegetables, if desired.
